_sText:
mg_smash_mars ... better...harder.crazier !!!!

in the first place i say thx to paul_deagle for insperation.

but...

i wannt a bigger better crazier smashmap.I want mg_smash_mars!!!

Fix:

-perfect movement on map dont need special Server cfg its on map interjects.
-now 3 minutes smash time
-perfomance optimized no lags
-reform gameplay

Gameplay:

-the 2 Terrorists must shoot from cannons at the platforms with the CT's on. After 3 minutes teleport to final battle where the ct must press a button to kill the Terrorits.They shoot with cannons on the Counterterrorits
set the brightness on css highest for optimal graphic.

Spawns:

-52 Slots

music:

-little Jukebox at terrorits spawn with pendulum music or mute botten.


PS : Suche noch eine Mapper Community, ich bins leid immer alleine zu mappen und zu testen ^^

sry for my bad english xD

Have Fun !!!
